category.simplystatus.name: SimplyStatus
key.simplystatus.OffHand: Show/hide item in the other hand
simplystatus.special.thanks: Special thanks to player §9§lGRUI_72§r for his help with this project. Search for bugs and more!
config.simplystatus.notConnected:
You are not connected to Discord!
Check your Internet connection and the presence of Discord on your computer
config.simplystatus.notConnectedLinux: If you have Discord installed through a third-party app store, like Flatpak, Snap, etc. Then look up RPC connectivity solutions, preferably about your app store and system in search engines
config.simplystatus.viewNameServer: Display server name from the list
config.simplystatus.OffHand: Displaying an item with the other hand
config.simplystatus.translate.voice_two: You talk to the player next to you
config.simplystatus.changeStatusNameInMi: Change the status name on Minecraft
config.simplystatus.addonsPresences.warn: §7§o§lAttention!§r§7§o at the moment only saving works here [no :)], soon [possibly] there will be functions
message.simplystatus.viewIP.true: §7SimplyStatus§r » The display of this server's address was turned on
message.simplystatus.viewIP.false: §7SimplyStatus§r » The display of this server address has been disabled
message.simplystatus.viewName.false: §7SimplyStatus§r » The server name display has been disabled
message.simplystatus.showTime.true: §7SimplyStatus§r » The status will now show how much you play
message.simplystatus.showTime.false: §7SimplyStatus§r » Now the status will not show how long you have played
message.simplystatus.bedrock.true: §7SimplyStatus§r » Displaying icons from Minecraft: Bedrock Edition is now enabled
message.simplystatus.bedrock.false: §7SimplyStatus§r » Displaying icons from Minecraft: Bedrock Edition is disabled
message.simplystatus.viewOffHand.true: §7SimplyStatus§r » The display of the item of the other hand is on
message.simplystatus.viewOffHand.false: §7SimplyStatus§r » The display of the object of the other hand is turned off
message.simplystatus.errorIsSinglePlayer: §7SimplyStatus§r » You can't use this in singleplayer!
message.simplystatus.username.true: §7SimplyStatus§r » Your game nickname will now be displayed in the status
message.simplystatus.username.false: §7SimplyStatus§r » Your Discord nickname will now be displayed in the status
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.simplysta: Simple mod for game status Discord
status.simplystatus.unknownNamePlayer: The player's name was not found
status.simplystatus.text_DeathThree: The player could not survive in a harsh world
status.simplystatus.text_UnknownServer: The name of this server is unknown
status.simplystatus.text_goodPlayer: Wow, this player might be a good person
